name: Copy Cat (Prajwal Nagpure)
description:
Copy Cat is a 2d, adventure, puzzle, platformer game.

~Best OFFLINE puzzle, platformer game.

~Copy Cat is inspired by mindloop.

~in this game you are controlling two different Characters with only one controller at the same time.

~in this game user are suppose to find a way to door and also find some hidden doors.

~in Copy Cat each level gives you different ways and technique to solve them.

~try now and get an amazing experience.
